views.markdown:
- Added iOS 8 support - Improved preferences with Cephei support - Optimized performance and implementation design - Reimplemented on/off switch (was this not working before? ._.)
- Added Day of Week option (what a popular request!)
- Compatible with iOS 6 (and earlier)
- Compatible with all devices, including iPads and non-retina devices
- Added "Show All Timestamps" option for iOS <=6 users
- Optimized and fixed a few preferences bugs
- Consolidated code injections for more efficient performance

As always, you can get more information on this update by checking out the recent changes on the Github repo (link in description). Thanks for using Dated!
